page_content: The page discusses an upcoming football match between Berner Young Boys and FC Basel, along with travel and security recommendations.
The page provides information on various administrative updates, including siren tests, new appointments, and road construction.
The page provides guidelines on how to declare income and assets when involved in a community of heirs or co-owners for tax purposes.
The page provides information on the BEA/Pferd spring fair in Bern, advising attendees to use public transportation due to expected traffic congestion.
The page provides information on tax deductions for parents of adult children who are still in education and financially dependent.
The page provides information on traffic disruptions in Bern due to the 26th Swiss Women's Run, advising attendees to use public transportation.
The page provides information on how to declare income from board memberships and public offices that include meeting fees.
